sentence: Very nice stay in a modernised hotel
The pool is great to refresh and start a new day

Stunning artwork and sculptures very high quality and standards from staff only small disappointment was spa was fully booked and there was some repair work going on but staff dealt with this very well to minimize disruption
The hotel is well placed centrally in the city a short walk from most attractions also convenient for the tram when they have finished renovating or whatever they are doing

Everything about it was good special mention for the food but the highest praise for the staff everyone without exception from a maintenance man in the elevator gym staff concierge reception and Davide in the restaurant were friendly efficient and a real contrast to many of the other hotels of similar ilk that I have been staying in recently
Beautiful building in Manchester which has been very tastefully modernised on the inside

The horel is good the breakfast is great though some rooms definitely need renovation BUT it is almost 3 weeks I have been trying to get any feedback from the hotel about the property I had left in the room when checking out
Beautiful and sympathetic restoration with a fantastic extension
The hotel has been sensitively renovated to a high standard
Location and staff Room maintenance
The breakfast at the hotel was worth every penny of a non refundable rate and was a great refresh meal while we stayed
I stay regularly in London at Premier Inn and although it is recently refurbished the standard was very similar but the cost significantly less so disappointed with VFM and mine is a realistic view
I emailed the hotel asking if we could maybe book in early 1ish as the train was leaving at 12 and we wanted to refresh before we left
Hotel in process of refurb
The hotel was being refurbished which I was not informed about prior to my stay
The hotel was undergoing renovations
Avoid this hotel until they have completed their refurbishments
I am sure the hotel would be great had these services not been closed due to refurbishment
Spa was being refurbished and bokingcom did not appear to have this on the details when we booked
The lady also offered to make sure our room was on the top floor as far away from the refurb as possible when I expressed my concerns about possible works noise
When attending all the facilitys were all closed due to a refurbishment but we was not made aware of this

Prior to our arrival we had been in eager anticipation this time to see for ourselves the results of a fairly major renovation of the ground floor area over the winter months though the changes were not quite as radical as we had been led to believe on our previous visit in 2018As on previous visits we were given a warm and friendly welcome on arrival this time by Katie at the remodeled reception desk
I did get text updates over the course of the day on the status
Reported to concierge very helpful and said maintenance would reboot the controls whilst we were out no different when back unfortunately
Until recently they were completing a few renovations in order to offer better facilities so I ca n’t comment on those but will after my next visit
I have not stayed here since the refurb in recent years which has made the place look fantastic
Hotel was ok but room was quite old and should be renovated
This time had a small double which was clean but needed a refurbish
Refurbished vroom was very comfortable quiet and stylishdid not like that cups spoons glasses etc were all wrapped in plastic completely unnecessary
The room had maintenance issues and the carpet was dusty
Our room had been recently modernised and had a fresh but contemporary feel
I would like to extend my thanks to Mark for the tour and say that the internal decor and renovation does justice to this magnificent building

When the maintenance guy did arrive he said he would come back when we were out that night but he never did again I had to ask at reception for a 5 star hotel I would not expect to have to ask for a fault to be resolved as many times as I did
Refurbished restaurant where breakfast is served had lots of really small tables for 2 squashed tightly together bit of a squeeze on busy mornings and not very practical
Really let us down the hotel refurb
The toilet needs repairing
The room needs update
